affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 表示"...的"

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 父母亲的，父母的；亲代的，亲本的
出身；亲子关系；门第；起源

word_group.brief_definition: 上级公司；母公司；父公司
养父母；领养父母；寄养父母
新的父母；新父级；新型亲本（医）
宽纵的父母；溺爱的父母
成为父亲（母亲）；为人父（母）

bilingual.source: Make a fruit salad for your parent.
bilingual.target: 为你的父母做一个水果沙拉。

bilingual.source: You cannot shir your duties as a parent.
bilingual.target: 你不能逃避作为父母的责任。

bilingual.source: A parent should listen to their child's concerns.
bilingual.target: 父母应该倾听孩子的担忧。

bilingual.source: My parent always supports me in my decisions.
bilingual.target: 我的父母总是在我的决定中支持我。

bilingual.source: Every parent wants the best for their children.
bilingual.target: 每个父母都希望孩子得到最好的。

bilingual.source: A good parent teaches their child to be independent.
bilingual.target: 一个好的父母会教孩子独立。

bilingual.source: Parents in a single parent family need more support.
bilingual.target: 单亲家庭的父母需要更多的支持。

bilingual.source: Each parent contributes one allele for each trait.
bilingual.target: 每个父母为每个性状贡献一个等位基因。

bilingual.source: Being a parent is a challenging but rewarding experience.
bilingual.target: 做父母是一种具有挑战但回报丰厚的经历。

list.abstract: parent（英 [ˈpeərənt]，美 [ˈperənt]），英语单词，作名词为父亲；母亲；养父。作动词为做…的父亲。短语搭配有single-parent family（单亲家庭）。例句为“At this point the unwilling parent speaks up.（在这一点上，不情愿的家长说了出来。）” parent相关近义词有father、principle等，相关反义词有child。复数为parents。

yingyinNormal.en: And that's not an opportunity people always get before a parent dies, and I'm grateful to have had that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人们并不是都能在父母离世前有这样的机会，我很感激有这样的机会。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, where, did she go? To her parent's I think and she said you shouldn't call her. But if I were you I would.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那她…她上哪去了？她父母家，她叫你不要打电话给她，要是我就会打。

yingyinNormal.en: He's been asking people, hoping to trace that trait across the whole city to see if he can find his birth parent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他一直在到处问，希望在整个城市中找出会卷舌头的人看看能不能找到自己的亲生父母。

yingyinNormal.en: Women deserve to be able to take time off to care for a new baby, an ailing parent, or take a sick day for themselves without running into hardship.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妇女们应该能够有时间照料新生儿和患病的父母，并能够请病假，而这些不能让她们陷入贫困。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you, as a United States senator, personally comfortable saying to a grieving parent, Superman could have saved your child, but on principle, we did not want him to act?
yingyinNormal.zh: 而你，作为一名美国参议员，能否很坦然地对沉浸在悲痛中的父母说“超人本可以救你的孩子，但原则上来说，我们不希望他去救？”

yingyinNormal.en: Well, most of being a parent isn't fair. Right now, Alex is obsessed with some CEO business woman author who's basically an older-looking version of me. We're the same age, by the way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为人父母大部分时候都没有公平可言。现在艾丽克斯迷上了一个什么CEO商业女强人作家，她基本上就是个看起来老一点版本的我。顺带一提我和她同龄。

yingyinNormal.en: Unlike you, I don't have a rich husband. What I do have is a reputation for being a screw-up who never follows through on anything, which is why, in case you haven't noticed, I'm in my third year of a two-year college program and still living in my parent basement.
yingyinNormal.zh: 跟你不同，我没有有钱的老公，大家都觉得我什么事都会搞砸，什么事都坚持不下去，这就是为什么 如果你没留意到的话，两年的大学我已经读了第三年了，而且还住在父母的地下室里。

yingyinNormal.en: It's my job as both parent committee chair and responsible mother.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我既得是家长会主席，又是称职的妈妈。

yingyinNormal.en: So this is being a parent? I think I can handle this. Too intense. Too intense.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以这就是带孩子，是吧？我想我可以处理得很好的。太难了，太难了。

yingyinNormal.en: April! Woman of the hour. Everyone is so excited for your parent party tonight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾普莉！焦点女人，大家都激动地等待你今晚的家长派对。

yingyinNormal.en: Stuck at school. Some parent-teacher thing. You can go. I'll get the information.
yingyinNormal.zh: 学校有事，老师和家长间的事，你可以走了，我留下来上课。

yingyinNormal.en: Luke said that you knew about it! I didn't know about it! I said a parent knew about it. Phil!
yingyinNormal.zh: 卢克说你知道的。我不知道，我说有家长知道。菲尔！

yingyinNormal.en: The next race is the relay. Each child needs to pick a parent to race. Peppa, pick me, pick me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 下一个比赛项目是接力赛。小朋友都要和爸爸妈妈一起比赛。选我，选我，选我。

yingyinNormal.en: Here's my dilemma: I kind of want to stay home. But Bernadette is a way better parent than I am.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我纠结的是：我有点想在家当家庭煮夫。但伯纳黛特比我更会带孩子。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, what's going on there? Oh, that's Parent's Day, first grade. That's me with the janitor Martin.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那张是什么？那是一年级的家长日，我和校警马丁的合照。

yingyinNormal.en: I tried to limit it to one parent. We're all going to a movie, too, Tony. Don't mind us. We'll be sitting on the other side of the theater. Not watching you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我努力只让一位家长开车送我。我们都要去看电影，托尼。别介意。我们会坐在电影院的另一头。不会盯着你的。

yingyinNormal.en: Check it out, no one will tell me where Emily is, so I'm gonna send 72 long-stem, red roses to Emily's parent's house, one for each day that I've known and loved her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听我说，大家都不肯说艾蜜莉在哪里，我决定买72朵长茎红玫瑰送去艾蜜莉爸妈家，每朵代表我认识她，并且深爱她的每一天。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, yes, What do you want me to do? I'll go talk to neighbors. We'll handle the ground investigation, Mr. Kim. That's our job. But if there's something a parent can do, it's shedding light for us on who your daughter is and the people she talks to.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，好，嗯... 你要我帮你什么？我可以去和邻居问一问。我们会负责询问，金先生。这是我们的工作。作为家长能帮到忙的，就是告诉我们你所了解的女儿还有她所接触的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Good morning, I'm Faustine Rhee. A parent's worst nightmare comes true this morning for David Kim. In a shocking and thoroughly mind-boggling conclusion to a story that's captivated the Bay Area, Margot Kim, missing now for five days, has just been tragically declared dead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 早上好，我是福斯汀·利。今天早上作为一位父亲大卫·金的最害怕的事情还是发生了。这件轰动了湾区的案件有了令人震惊和让人完全不能接受的定论，失踪了五天的玛戈·金，在不久前不幸地被宣告死亡。

yingyinNormal.en: I just told every detail I know to whoever I got off the phone with an hour ago. I don't know what you guys are doing. I promise you, Mr. Kim, we are taking this very seriously. And as a parent myself, I can only imagine what you must be feeling. But for me to help you, I do need to know how everything unfolded from your eyes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一个小时前刚刚给电话里的人讲了我知道的每一个细节。真不知道你们这些人在干什么。我向你保证，金先生，我们非常重视这件事。我也是一个母亲，我完全理解你的感受。但是站在帮助你的立场上，我必须知道所有的事情从你的视角是怎样的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a father or mother of a child

examination_example.sentence: Still, while every <highlight>parent</highlight> would like to be patient, this is no easy task.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管每个父母都想保持耐心，但这并不是一件容易的事情。

examination_example.sentence: He reads so passionately that his <highlight>parents</highlight> have to institute a "no reading policy" at the dinner table.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他阅读热情如此之高，以至于他的父母不得不在餐桌上制定“禁止阅读政策”。

examination_example.sentence: While their <highlight>parents</highlight> were content to work long hours, young people value flexibility.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然他们的父母满足于长时间工作，但年轻人重视灵活性。

sense_info_list.en: an animal or plant that produces offspring
an organization that produces and owns or controls smaller organizations of the same type

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 父母的；亲代的；亲本的

word_family.mean: n. 父亲；母亲；养父；养母；家长；母公司；亲本；总公司；起源；亲代

sense_info_list.en: a father or mother of a child

examination_example.sentence: Many <highlight>parents</highlight> and teachers are ardent supporters of homework.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多家长和老师都是家庭作业的热心支持者。

examination_example.sentence: Nicole admitted she was fortunate, as she was able to live with her <highlight>parents</highlight> and overhaul her spending—and life—to get herself on track financially.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 妮可承认她很幸运，因为她可以和父母住在一起，彻底改变了她的花费——和生活——让自己在经济上走上正轨。

examination_example.sentence: She was sobbing at the dinner table with her <highlight>parents</highlight>, with whom she had just moved back in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她和父母坐在餐桌旁啜泣，她刚搬回来和父母住在一起。

sense_info_list.en: an animal or plant that produces offspring

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 表示"...的"

word_usage.usage:
parent表“父亲”或“母亲”，为单数形式；如表双亲，须用其复数形式parents。注意父母双亲只有两个人，因此可与both, either, neither等不定代词连用，而不与all, any, none等不定代词连用。
示例：我父母都喜欢他。
误 All my parents like him.
正 Both my parents like him.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 亲子关系；父母身份
adj. 父母的；亲代的；亲本的

word_family.mean: n. 父亲；母亲；养父；养母；家长；母公司；亲本；总公司；起源；亲代

sense_info_list.en: a father or mother of a child

examination_example.sentence: By playing with children, <highlight>parents</highlight> can prevent them from being harmed by stress.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过与孩子玩耍，父母可以防止他们受到压力的伤害。

examination_example.sentence: What does David Lancy advise American <highlight>parents</highlight> to do?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大卫·朗姿(David Lancy)建议美国父母做什么？

examination_example.sentence: Many people feel guilty when they cannot find a place other than a nursing home for their <highlight>parents</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多人在为父母找不到养老院以外的地方时会感到内疚。

sense_info_list.en: act as a father or a mother

examination_example.sentence: It doesn't have to involve spending a lot of money or time, or joining a <highlight>parenting</highlight> group.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不一定要花很多钱或时间，也不一定要加入育儿小组。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 表示"...的"

word_usage.usage:
parent表“父亲”或“母亲”，为单数形式；如表双亲，须用其复数形式parents。注意父母双亲只有两个人，因此可与both, either, neither等不定代词连用，而不与all, any, none等不定代词连用。
示例：我父母都喜欢他。
误 All my parents like him.
正 Both my parents like him.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 亲子关系；父母身份

word_family.mean: n. 父亲；母亲；养父；养母；家长；母公司；亲本；总公司；起源；亲代

examination_example.sentence: My <highlight>parents</highlight> thought all of this was a grand idea and called Betsy's dad with their permission .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的父母认为这是一个好主意，并打电话给贝琪的爸爸，征得了他们的同意。

examination_example.sentence: I understood immediately what my <highlight>parents</highlight> were worried about.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我立刻明白了我父母担心的是什么。

examination_example.sentence: As I told my <highlight>parents</highlight> at dinner that first night, it was all a little more high-pressure than I'd expected .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如我在第一个晚上的晚餐上告诉我父母的那样，这比我预期的压力要大一点。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a father or mother of a child

examination_example.sentence: Teachers and <highlight>parents</highlight> may give you a hand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老师和父母可能会帮你一把。

examination_example.sentence: Boys and girls, you should look after yourselves when your <highlight>parents</highlight> are not at home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 孩子们，当你们的父母不在家的时候，你们应该照顾好自己。

examination_example.sentence: He was separated from his <highlight>parents</highlight> and never saw them again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他和父母分开了，再也没有见过他们。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 表示"...的"

word_usage.usage:
parent表“父亲”或“母亲”，为单数形式；如表双亲，须用其复数形式parents。注意父母双亲只有两个人，因此可与both, either, neither等不定代词连用，而不与all, any, none等不定代词连用。
示例：我父母都喜欢他。
误 All my parents like him.
正 Both my parents like him.
